abilities.name: Cyclone
about: Damages enemies around encounter, then performs a spinning series of attacks as it travels to a target location

abilities.name: Demon Cleave
about: Swings weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging enemies in an area in front of them

abilities.name: Enraged Demon Cleave
about: Swings weapon (or both weapons if dual wielding) in an arc, damaging enemies in an area in front of them

abilities.name: Dual Strike
about: Attacks with both weapons, dealing the damage of both in one strike

abilities.name: Enrage
about: Increases movement speed, damage, attack and cast speed

abilities.name: Empowered Fire Enrage
about: Increases movement speed, damage, attack and cast speed
